verses.verse: And when <S%H5315>any<s%> one <S%H7126>offereth<s%> an <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> shall be of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%>; and he shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> upon <S%H5414>it<s%>, and put frankincense <S%H3828>thereon<s%>:

and he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it to <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>; and he shall <S%H7061>take<s%> <S%H8033>thereout<s%> his <S%H7062>handful<s%> of the fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H8081>thereof<s%>, and of the oil <S%H3828>thereof<s%>, with all the frankincense <S%H3548>thereof<s%>. And the priest shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it as the <S%H234>memorial<s%> thereof upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>:

and that which is <S%H3498>left<s%> of the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> shall be <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>': it is a thing <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>.

And when thou <S%H7126>offerest<s%> an <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> <S%H3989>baken<s%> in the <S%H8574>oven<s%>, it shall be <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, or <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

And if thy <S%H7133>oblation<s%> be a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> of the <S%H4227>baking-pan<s%>, it shall be of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%>, <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>.
Thou shalt <S%H6626>part<s%> it in <S%H6595>pieces<s%>, and <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H4503>thereon<s%>: it is a meal-offering.
And if thy <S%H7133>oblation<s%> be a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> of the <S%H4802>frying-pan<s%>, it shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> that is <S%H6213>made<s%> of these things unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: and it shall be <S%H7126>presented<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and he shall <S%H5066>bring<s%> it unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7311>take<s%> up from the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> the <S%H234>memorial<s%> <S%H6999>thereof<s%>, and shall burn it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And that which is <S%H3498>left<s%> of the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> shall be <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>': it is a thing <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>.

No <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, which ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven<s%>; for ye shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> no <S%H2557>leaven<s%>, nor any <S%H1706>honey<s%>, as an <S%H801>offering<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

As an <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of <S%H7225>first<s%>- fruits ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> them unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: but they shall not come <S%H5927>up<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And every <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of thy <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> shalt thou <S%H4414>season<s%> with <S%H4417>salt<s%>; neither shalt thou suffer the <S%H4417>salt<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of thy <S%H430>God<s%> to be <S%H7673>lacking<s%> from thy <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>: with all thine <S%H7133>oblations<s%> thou shalt <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H4417>salt<s%>.

And if thou <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> of <S%H1061>first-fruits<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thou shalt <S%H7126>offer<s%> for the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> of thy <S%H1061>first-fruits<s%> grain in the <S%H24>ear<s%> <S%H7033>parched<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, <S%H1643>bruised<s%> grain of the fresh <S%H3759>ear<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> upon <S%H7760>it<s%>, and lay <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> <S%H4503>thereon<s%>: it is a meal-offering.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> the <S%H234>memorial<s%> of <S%H1643>it<s%>, part of the bruised grain <S%H8081>thereof<s%>, and part of the oil <S%H3828>thereof<s%>, with all the frankincense <S%H801>thereof<s%>: it is an offering made by fire unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
